page.title: 06MY WEEK-END BY NICOLA
page.content: {8.6.85.}After getting up at 7.45a.m. and eating my breakfast I went to synchronised swimming lessons.Later we went to the shops.Then we had our dinner.Our family went to Times Furnishing and bought a settee.We came home, and I watched Sinbad on television.After tea we went to the tip to throw away some rubbish.We went home and I went to bed at 8.40pm.My tooth came out. {9.6.85 I got up at 8.28am.When I looked under my pillow, the fairies had not come. After breakfast I tidied my bedroom. Then we went to Macclesfield,as my dad was playing football, at the Leisure Centre.I watched from a balcony.Two girls were giving out gifts.I got 3 balloons, a hat, and 2 stickers.We had our dinner and tea there then returned home.I went to bed at 9.10p.m.
